articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and premier of the Cabinet, inspected the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex to learn about the construction of oxygen heat blast furnace.
					 While going round the construction site, Pak encouraged officials and workers to push forward with the project in its final stage.
					
					 A consultative meeting was held on the spot.
					
					 The meeting underlined the need to make all-out efforts to finish the project for building an oxygen heat blast furnace and installing a large oxygen separator in its final stage and took the steps to settle the issues arising in Juche iron production.
					
					 Pak also acquainted himself in detail with the work of the Chongjin Steel Plant and the Puryong Ferroalloy Factory and discussed the increase of production of Juche iron and ferro-alloy to the maximum.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman on Australia's Hostile Moves
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman on Australia's Hostile Moves
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA on Saturday as regards Australia's frantic engagement in the hostile acts of the U.S. against the DPRK:
					 Lately, Australia is showing dangerous moves of zealously joining the frenzied political and military provocations of the U.S. against the DPRK while these provocations aggravate the situation of the Korean peninsula into a touch-and go phase.
					
					 The Australian foreign minister personally expressed her support for the stand of the U.S. to consider all options including the use of force towards the DPRK, and turned up at Panmunjom on October 11 together with the Australian defense minister to condemn the DPRK during her visit to south Korea.
					
					 On the other hand, it was reported that Australian troops have been conducting a joint drill for amphibious landings since last April with U.S. Marine troops deployed in Darwin of Australia.
					
					 Against this backdrop, there are reports in media that Australian forces are preparing for a war on the Korean peninsula, including the report that an Australian attack submarine is already in the potential war zone to take part in joint exercises with U.S. and Japanese submarines and a flotilla of Australian frigates is scheduled to arrive in the next few weeks in the waters off south Korea to join any U.S.-imposed naval blockade of the DPRK.
					
					 The reckless remarks and conducts by the Australian government officials in support of the military option of the U.S. against the DPRK are foolish acts of allowing themselves to be exploited by Trump's selfish "America First Policy" at the cost of their own national interests.
					
					 Besides, turning Australian territory into a front-line base for the U.S. invasion of the DPRK and sending its troops as the "shock brigade" for the war of aggression pursued by the U.S. are tantamount to a suicidal act of bringing back the misery that Australia had gone through during the past Korean War.
					
					 Should Australia continue to follow the U.S. in imposing military, economic and diplomatic pressure upon the DPRK despite our repeated warnings, they will not be able to avoid a disaster.
					
					 Instead of blindly following the invasion policy of its so-called "ally", Australian officials should talk and act with discretion based on their own principle and realize that working for the development of friendly relations with other countries is the best way to safeguard the security of their own country and citizens.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Will Face Ruin for Dreaming of "Unification through Absorption"
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Will Face Ruin for Dreaming of "Unification through Absorption"
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Consultative Council for National Reconciliation in a statement Saturday denounced the south Korean puppet regime for getting reckless while calling for "unification through absorption."
					 The Supreme Court, a puppet judicial organ, let out a litany of sleep-talking like focusing on the issue of setting up "examination committee for reappointing judicial officers in the north", "schooling" those who passed the examination and "including them in the Unified Ministry of Justice", the issue of "reinstating and reappointing law-related officials who had been subject to suppression under the north's regime", and the issue of dispatching personnel necessary for judicial organs in the north after "unification through absorption" while crying out for studying the "issue of handling" the north's judicial organs from now as they play a pivotal role in defending the social system.
					
					 The statement branded this as another intolerable politically-motivated provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 The present authorities of south Korea are talking about candlelight mindset while styling themselves a "government supported by candlelight" but in fact, they are covering the path quite contrary to it.
					
					 Those, who had pursued the ambition of "unification under the liberal democracy" while shunning the sincere reconciliation of the nation unanimously desired by all Koreans, faced the most miserable end without exception.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the present ruling quarters has not yet got awakened from illusion of "unification through absorption". Deriding its dirty and despicable acts, the statement continued:
					
					 We are consistent in our stand to settle the reunification issue in a peaceful way, but if the puppet forces dare provoke the DPRK, we will put a final end to the evil cycle of confrontation between the fellow countrymen with the powerful revolutionary armed forces which have been built up to victorious conclude the standoff with the U.S. as we had already clarified.
					
					 We will also keep tabs on those traitors to the nation including the fools who invent such issues as "handling" the law enforcement officials in the back room while dreaming a pipe dream of "unification through absorption".
					
					 The judicial organs of the DPRK will punish without discrimination by our law the vicious elements of the puppet judicial authorities running reckless as a shock brigade in executing the undemocratic laws inciting sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with the fellow countrymen after enacting them while working as henchmen executing the U.S. policy for colonial domination.

articles.title: Men's Premier League Football Matches
articles.content:
Men's Premier League Football Matches
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The all-the-year-round men's premier league football matches, which started in last December, near its final stage in Pyongyang with the beginning of men's premier soccer league for the DPRK Championships on September 5.
					 According to an official of the DPRK Football Association, every team has made considerable progress in improving the teamwork skills and technique of players through several rounds of league matches.
					
					 In this season to be influential in deciding the final rankings, 103 goals have been made in 40 matches, over three goals in 18 matches in particular, he said, adding:
					
					 As of October 12, the April 25 team and the Amnokgang team top the team standings with three wins and one draw and three wins and two draws respectively.
					
					 The men's premier soccer league for the DPRK Championships will close on October 26.

articles.title: DPRK Acrobats Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Acrobats Back Home
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK acrobats won Gold Lion Prize at the 16th China Wuqiao International Acrobatics Festival.
					 Taking part in the festival, held on Sept. 29-Oct. 4, were excellent acrobats from 17 countries and regions including the DPRK, Mongolia, Russia, France, Italy, Spain and Ukraine.
					
					 In "Aerial Trapeze" the DPRK acrobats presented various movements of high technique, winning warm applause of jury and audience.
					
					 They came back home on Saturday.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on Oct. 5.
					 The message extended warmest congratulations and fraternal greetings on behalf of all the members and the national leader of the party to Kim Jong Un on the 72nd birthday of the WPK.
					
					 It expressed the belief that the WPK under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un would continue to emerge victorious in the struggle to defend the country's sovereignty and the dignity of the nation from the frantic anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Reiterating full support and solidarity with the Korean people's struggle, the message wished Kim Jong Un bigger successrd in his noble work.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Equatorial Guinean Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Equatorial Guinean Party Leader
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Jeronimo Osa Osa Ecoro, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, on Oct. 3.
					 The message said that all the members of the Party and its supporters extended warmest and heartfelt congratulations, on behalf of Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, its founder-chairman, to Kim Jong Un and the WPK and all the Korean people on the occasion of the 72nd birthday of the WPK.
					
					 It hoped that the auspicious founding anniversary of the great WPK wisely leading the Korean people would be celebrated with splendor.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Machine Industry
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Machine Industry
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- New products have been developed in the field of machine industry of the DPRK, as part of the efforts to put production processes on a Juche and modern basis.
					 The Ryongsong Machine Complex manufactured a new type of air compressor by its own efforts and technology.
					
					 The Taean Heavy Machine Complex succeeded in producing synthetic volt-ampere transformer and the Rakwon Machine Complex in manufacturing concrete-mixture pressure pump.
					
					 The Huichon Precision Machine Plant, Sunchon Engine Factory and Hamhung Tire Factory are turning out new products, including fuel pump, engine and tire, adapted for the specific conditions of the country.
					
					 The Anju Insulating Material Factory established the production process of high-quality impregnating and coating varnish, while introducing newly-made acrylic paints for painting vehicles into different units.
					
					 The drive to develop new products has also been witnessed at the Hamhung Youth Electric Appliances Plant, Munchon Valve Factory and Pyongyang Grindstone Factory.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Nuclear Devil Threatening World
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Terms U.S. Nuclear Devil Threatening World
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Not content with having called for "total destruction" of the DPRK, the U.S. is getting more frantic in its hysteria for invasion and war.
					 Shortly ago Japanese newspaper Japan Times said that the U.S. calculated that it can destroy someone's nuclear facilities by using smaller tactical nuclear weapons and will finish the examination of their development and deployment until the year end.
					
					 On the other hand, various foreign sources reported that against the backdrop of the increasing tension on the Korean peninsula, the U.S. Ronald Reagan nuclear carrier strike group is sailing to the East Sea of Korea to stage what they called a "high-intensity joint drill" together with the south Korean puppet navy from mid-Oct. and that Theodore Roosevelt nuclear carrier strike group has left for the Pacific.
					
					 This is a reckless act of war maniacs as it only drives the tense situation on the peninsula into the point of explosion.
					
					 Trump's flurry of hysterical military remarks made the situation on the Korean peninsula so dangerous that no one knows at what time a nuclear war will break out to claim tens of thousands of human lives.
					
					 As if vying with each other, U.S. warmongers have shown their cards-- various "military options" for a nuclear war against the DPRK--and trumpeted about the use of smaller tactical nuclear weapons and "unprecedented joint drills".
					
					 When viewing alone the issue of use of smaller tactical nuclear weapons pursued by the U.S., it actually means the high likelihood of a nuclear war.
					
					 That's why some dignitaries of the U.S. political, military and academic circles are concerned about the said fact.
					
					 U.S. Senator Dianne Feinstein from the Democratic Party said that "she would as ever resolutely oppose such reckless scenario for the use of smaller tactical nuclear weapons, adding there would be no limited nuclear war."
					
					 All the facts go to prove that the U.S., the world's biggest nuclear weapons state which inflicted a nuclear disaster upon humankind for the first time, remains the arch criminal and the worst cancer-like entity posing threat to global peace and security, not to mention the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is the pathological symptoms of the U.S. to calculate it can bring to its knees the DPRK armed with nukes of justice while staging provocative nuclear war rehearsals.
					
					 From the historical point of view, the U.S. aggressors were doomed to be forlorn wandering spirits whenever they invaded Korea.
					
					 The U.S. must know it is not difficult for the DPRK's nuclear force to wipe out the war forces and means sent to the Korean peninsula as the U.S. mainland is within in the striking range.
					
					 Even though the U.S. opts for the smaller tactical nuclear weapons and anything else, it is the resolution of the DPRK to make the former pay dearly for its aggression without fail.
					
					 The world will clearly see how severely the Korean army and people will punish the U.S. imperialists in their death-bed struggle.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands Threatening Remarks of Trump as Last-ditch Effort of Loser
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands Threatening Remarks of Trump as Last-ditch Effort of Loser
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Trump, an old lunatic, hurled a stream of abuses at the DPRK, which seemed to be suggestive of an extreme option against it.
					 He recently bluffed, talking about "calm before a storm" when meeting with military brass hats of the U.S.
					
					 Some days later, he made reckless remarks that the past DPRK-U.S. dialogue proved ineffective and that only one thing would prove effective.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a commentary that such remarks are nothing but grumbles of the hooligan without an equal in the world, who is trembling with fear of the DPRK's toughest counteroffensive against the U.S.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 There is poor calculation to escape the unfavorable circumstances by frightening the DPRK.
					
					 Trump's remarks are aimed to prevent the DPRK from taking strategic measures to attain the final goal of rounding off its state nuclear force and drive to anti-DPRK sanctions and pressure those countries concerned about the prevailing situation through escalating the tension to the maximum and, at the same time, tide over the ruling crisis at home and abroad.
					
					 Trump is well advised to clearly understand that his rude remarks will not deter somebody but make the U.S. society all the more uneasy and accelerate the doom of the evil empire.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists opt for military provocation against the DPRK, the U.S. mainland will be reduced to ashes by the merciless nuclear retaliatory strike and the south Korean puppet forces, too, will have to pay dearly for toeing the U.S. line.

articles.title: Papers Slam S. Korean Regime's Dependence on Outsiders
articles.content:
Papers Slam S. Korean Regime's Dependence on Outsiders
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK Saturday deal with the miserable situation of the south Korean puppet regime which has been subject to maltreatment and contempt, cold treatment and humiliation for its kowtowing to the U.S. and Japan.
					 Rodong Sinmun says in an article:
					
					 Sycophancy to the U.S. and dependence on outsiders are physiology and habitual practice of the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The same can be said of the present ruling forces of south Korea.
					
					 The pro-American stand of the south Korean puppet authorities, who have to be servile to the U.S., reading its face without their principle and self-respect, will only fan up the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. and bring about bitterer disaster to south Korea.
					
					 Japan is now getting heated in criticism of the south Korean authorities, excluding and psychologically pressing them. This is pursuant to conspiracy with the U.S.
					
					 In collusion with the U.S., the Japanese reactionaries are pressing hard the south Korean regime in a bid to get concession from it in tackling the sexual slavery and other past crimes and pave the road of reinvasion.
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities blindly follow and serve their masters, not seeing through this cynical ploy of the U.S. and Japan. Such behavior will bring nothing but maltreatment and losses, humiliation and disgrace to them.
					
					 Minju Joson in an article says that the "serious situation" in which there caused a crack in "trust" and "cooperation toward the north" with the U.S. and the relations with Japan is deteriorated is putting the puppet forces into uncontrollable unrest as they have lost public mind-set. The blame for such position rests on the wrong policy of dependence on outsiders by the south Korean authorities, who have pursued the one-sided policy towards the U.S. and Japan, betraying the expectation of public mind-set.

articles.title: GI Criminals Enjoy Extraordinary Privilege in S. Korea
articles.content:
GI Criminals Enjoy Extraordinary Privilege in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Many GIs in south Korea were not prosecuted for their crimes, according to south Korean News one on October 10.
					 The rate increased to 70.7 per cent in July this year from 58.2 percent in 2014.
					
					 In particular, 81.3 percent of GI felonious criminals were not punished this year.

articles.title: S. Korea: Repeal of Part-time Job in Educational Field Urged
articles.content:
S. Korea: Repeal of Part-time Job in Educational Field Urged
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper OhmyNews, the Solidarity Meeting for School Part-time Jobs launched a hunger strike outside the Seoul City Education Office on September 27 in demand of an end to discrimination against part-time workers.
					 The organization called for taking measures such as cancel of low-salary and liquidation of salary distinction.
					
					 In this regard, the Party of Justice issued a commentary on October 10 urging the ministry of Education and the Seoul City Education Office to accept the organization's demand.

articles.title: S. Korean Medical Workers Go on General Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Medical Workers Go on General Strike
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The branch of the hospital of Ulji University (Taejon) and the Ulji Hospital branch of Ulji University (Seoul) under the trade union of health and medical workers in south Korea went on an indefinite general strike in demand of minimum wage hike on Oct. 10, according to the south Korean paper Nodong and Segye.
					 The trade union announced a plan to launch an all-out action of the organization to support the struggle of the two branches at Ulji Hospital on October 17 in denunciation of the Ulji Foundation which broke the negotiation.
					
					 In this regard the paper said the minimum wage structure should be improved and the wage gap should be removed.

articles.title: S. Korean Lawmaker Slams Park Geun Hye Group for Their Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Lawmaker Slams Park Geun Hye Group for Their Crimes 
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A lawmakers of the ruling party of south Korea on Oct. 11 denounced the Park Geun Hye group for their act of fabricating the "Preparatory Committee for Unification" under the control of the "president" and squandering the money collected from the people as taxes without any success, according to the south Korean online paper Asian Economy.
					 He said that the committee expended 9.4 billion won for three years since it came into being. 
					
					 He called for conducting an intensive investigation into how the committee was established and the controversial issue of "unification by absorption," etc.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Administration Reviewed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Administration Reviewed
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The present chief executive's administration was reviewed by the south Korean internet newspaper Chamsesang in an article on October 10.
					 The article said he trumpeted about "society suitable for human to live" during his "presidential" election campaign but he is still asking the people to "wait".
					
					 What difference does the present regime have from the fascist regimes in the past, it queried.
					
					 It charged that the "government" is seeking to cover up its historical mistake and limitations with such words as "regime produced by candlelight" while keeping the frame of the conservative politics in the past.

articles.title: European Regional Seminar on Juche Idea Held
articles.content:
European Regional Seminar on Juche Idea Held
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A European regional Juche idea seminar on "Independence and Peace in the Present World" took place in Rome on October 7.
					 Displayed at its venue were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and books introducing the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were the secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, the director-general, the secretary general and directors of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, chiefs and members of British and German Juche idea study organizations and figures from Italian political parties, organizations and institutions.
					
					 The secretary general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea made a report at the seminar to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the seminar served as a significant occasion as it dealt with the issues arising in the independent forces' struggle to establish a fair international order against the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices, in connection with the Juche idea, and found solutions suited to the specific conditions of each country.
					
					 They expressed the will to strive for independence and prosperity of each country and region on the basis of the successes and experience gained through the seminar.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in European Juche Idea Seminar
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in European Juche Idea Seminar
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the European regional Juche idea seminar on "Independence and Peace in the Present World" on Oct. 7.
					The letter noted that the seminar had an in-depth discussion on the issues arising in defending national sovereignty, peace and socialism from the imperialists' threat of aggression at present, on the basis of the Juche idea, the Songun idea.
					
					The Juche idea, founded and developed in depth by President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il and being further enriched by Comrade Kim Jong Un, has displayed its tremendous vitality not only in the Korean people's struggle for freeing their country from the colonial rule but also in the long period since the birth of the DPRK, and it has lighted the road ahead of the progressives even after the collapse of socialism in East European countries, the letter said.
					
					It expressed full solidarity with the Korean people courageously advancing in the forefront of struggle for independence.
					
					And it stressed that a halt should be put to the provocations and unreasonable sanctions against the DPRK.

articles.title: WPK Praised in Nigeria and Poland
articles.content:
WPK Praised in Nigeria and Poland
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian political party and a Polish organization issued statements on October 9 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as the general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd birthday.
					 The People's Progressive Party of Nigeria said in its statement:
					
					 The WPK has proved ever-victorious despite the harsh circumstances of the history for more than 70 years from the very day of its foundation.
					
					 It had strengthened into an invincible party thanks to its founder President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il, its eternal leader.
					
					 The WPK, headed by respected HE Kim Jong Un who creditably carries forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders, is invariably advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, courageously meeting every challenge of the U.S. and its vassal forces.
					
					 This instills confidence in victory of the socialist cause and optimism into the world progressives.
					
					 The International Friendship Initiative "Explore DPRK" of Poland said:
					
					 The WPK is a powerful guiding force of the Korean revolution as it is guided by the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 So, the Korean people absolutely support and follow it and are filled with the strong will to devote their all to it.
					
					 The WPK is a model to be followed by the progressive political parties of the world.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia la actitud hostil anti-RPDC de Australia
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia la actitud hostil anti-RPDC de Australia
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que Australia se suma a los actos hostiles de Estados Unidos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 14 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					Mientras se crea una situacion tan delicada debido a las demenciales provocaciones politicas y militares de EE.UU. contra la RPDC, Australia muestra la tendencia peligrosa de  ofrecerse partidario fiel de EE.UU.
					
					El canciller australiano expreso personalmente el apoyo a la posicion de EE.UU. que examina todas las opciones posibles, incluso el uso de fuerzas armadas contra la RPDC. 
					
					El pasado dia 11, el y el ministro de Defensa del mismo pais aparecieron en Phanmunjom durante su visita al Sur de Corea y criticaron a la RPDC. 
					
					Segun trascendidos, los uniformados norteamericanos estacionados en Darwin, Australia, y los efectivos de este pais desarrollan desde abril pasado los ejercicios de la operacion de desembarco contra la RPDC. 
					
					En tales circunstancias, circulan las versiones de que las fuerzas armadas de Australia impulsan los preparativos de la guerra coreana tales como el despliegue del submarino de ataque australiano en la zona maritima operacional para los entrenamientos militares con los submarinos norteamericanos y japoneses y la llegada a unas semanas despues en las aguas surcoreanas de la flotilla de fragatas para el bloqueo naval anti-RPDC. 
					
					El irresponsable acto verbal de las figuras oficiales del gobierno australiano como apoyar la opcion militar anti-RPDC de EE.UU. resulta una tonteria de sacrificar los intereses nacionales en funcion de la doctrina egoista de Trump de "America es primera". 
					
					En particular, convertir el territorio australiano en la base avanzada de EE.UU. para la agresion a Corea y lanzar a sus uniformados como "brigada de choque" en la eventual guerra de agresion devienen un acto suicida que repetira el antecedente tragico de la pasada guerra coreana. 
					
					Australia sufrira desgracias si sigue sumandose a la campana militar, economica y diplomatica de EE.UU. contra la RPDC desoyendo la reiterada advertencia.
					
					En lugar de incorporarse a ciegas a la implementacion de  la politica agresiva de su "aliado", ese pais debera tener mucho cuidado con sus palabras y esforzarse por desarrollar las relaciones de amistad con otros paises teniendo presente que esto es el mejor remedio para preservar la seguridad nacional y el pueblo australiano.

articles.title: Portavoz del CRN condena la ilusion de "unificacion mediante la absorcion"
articles.content:
Portavoz del CRN condena la ilusion de "unificacion mediante la absorcion"
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que ultimamente, los titeres surcoreanos actuan irracionalmente hablando de la "unificacion mediante la absorcion", el portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional publico el dia 14 una declaracion que sigue:
					  Hace poco, los sujetos de la "Corte Suprema" del Sur de Corea dijeron que hace falta estudiar desde ahora el "problema de procesamiento" de los miembros de organos judiciales del Norte (de Corea) porque ellos desempenan el papel medular en defender el regimen.
					
					  Disparatearon ademas que daran el enfoque de estudio a los siguientes problemas: fundar el "comite de evaluacion de renombramiento de los magistrados norcoreanos" despues de lograda la "unificacion mediante la absorcion", "educar" a los aprobados en la investigacion y "admitirlos al Ministerio de Unificacion y Justicia", "reautorizar y renombrar a los magistrados que habian sido blancos de represion del poder norcoreano", enviar al personal necesario a los organos judiciales del Norte, etc.
					
					  Esto deviene otra imperdonable provocacion politica a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Ahora, las actuales autoridades surcoreanas suelen hablar de la opinion publica reflejada en la lucha con velas describiendose "el poder nacido de la misma", pero en realidad estan marchando en el sentido contrario.
					
					  Historicamente, tuvieron el fin mas tragico todos los que sonaban con la "unificacion bajo el sistema democratico liberal" dando espaldas a la verdadera reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion, deseadas unanimemente por todos los coreanos.
					
					  A pesar de este hecho, los actuales gobernantes surcoreanos abrigan todavia esa ilusion.
					
					  La RPDC exige constantemente resolver el problema de reunificacion del pais por via pacifica. Pero, si la banda titere surcoreana se atreve a atacarnos, como ya hemos declarado, acabaremos totalmente con el circulo vicioso de confrontacion fratricida usando las poderosas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias que hemos consolidado para la ultima batalla de enfrentamiento con EE.UU.
					
					  Igualmente, haremos balance de los crimenes de los traidores a la nacion, incluyendo esos imbeciles que idearon el "problema de procesamiento" de los funcionarios de nuestros organos judiciales abrigando el irrealizable sueno de la "unificacion mediante la absorcion", y les cobraremos sin falta el precio correspondiente.
					
					  En particular, nuestras instituciones judiciales buscaran y enjuiciaran sin piedad en virtud de nuestra ley a todas las figuras connotadas del circulo judicial surcoreano que fabrican las leyes infames a favor de EE.UU. y enfrentamiento fratricida y en contra de la democracia y las ejecutan al frente siendo lacayos de la implementacion de la politica de dominacion colonial de su amo gringo.
